name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge reunites Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael as they kick shell in a beautifully realized beat ’em up.
